title: Yubi Key
content:
I would like sign in using a Yubi Key, and without using a smart phone. (this should also include having a spare Yubi Key) The whole reason I got a Yubi Key is I don't have or want a smart phone (I do have one but it sits a home doing nothing). I also don't think its a wise move to have my login mechanism that authenticates me on an internet accessible general computing device. If that gets compromised then my account is compromised.

But when I tried to add 2FA to my account it asks me to use an authentication app. I stopped there when I get to my phone I might try and see if I can get around it. I don't want to use an authentication app I just want to use a Yubi Key.

Also what will happen to my account if one day my phone just stops working or I lose it?

title: YouTube reproduzir? Fazer cópias sem fins financeiro
content: Não sei compreendi a colocar , nunca entrei no YouTube pelo Mozilla ou Firefox .estou me desligando do Google. Estou procurando sites que não tem conectacoes com o mesmo.Seja visto que há muitas retaliações do YouTube e seus parceiros seja accoutts ou browrser. Não gosto de monopólio,,e tenho visto muito isto nos últimos anos. Andei fazendo uma pesquisa sobre vcs Firefox/ modzilla verso Google YouTube vcs tem grande parceria. Já estou casando desta internet bulgada burocrática,que para abrir um email comi este preciso de dois dias. Ontem lhe passei todos menos um email que Google roubou. Eu sei que havia problemas neles. Vcs acredita que as informações do Google para vcs concorrente e lícita? Pois bem , eu não tenho nada que me desabone nesta internet web.sempre respeitei todas as políticas por redes sociais. Nunca fui respeitado. Por isso o motivo de querer ser anônimo nas redes sociais,pq quem deveria salvar nossos dados, estão é a procura de informações a ponto de dentro de 2 horas te procurar na web loucamente,ao ponto de invadir sua privacidade. Como vcs dizem sobre a cultura "anônima" que não resolve o problema. Creio que alguém deveria ver isto? Pq se isto e fato, não pode deixar crianças usar computador ou internet, visto que , aquele que saiu da web, mudou para privado está exposto do mesmo jeito. Pergunta ⁉️ é ; porque tantas coisas que não deveria estar na plataforma, jogos azar, pornografia, vendas de drogas YouTube com pornografia etc. Me respeita não invadem minha privacidade que seremos bons parceiro. Não sei se compreende correto a questão acima,de qualquer forma fica minha indignação contra bo sistema, onde, eu devo te informar tudo em troca de chantagens e punições. Passar bem.

title: the visual and audio notifications of incoming emails to the inbox do not function correctly on gmail on Linux OS
content:
The visual and audio notifications for incoming emails being posted to the inbox of gmail under Mozillia Firefox do not function correctly when ran on a Linux Mint operating system computer.

I can get the visual notifications to work as long as the Firefox is open but once that session is closed the visual notifications are no longer issued, i.e. the setting to issue those notifications are not being saved upon closing of the browser.

I can get the audio notifications to work on a sporadic basis. I go into the settings on gmail and choose one of the audio sound notification choices and it works a few times when income emails are received into the inbox, but then just stops even if the current firefox/gmail session is still open.

My theory is that those firefox/gmail settings are not getting preserved/saved in proper manner to be available for subsequent sessions of firefox/gmail because firefox/gmail does not understand the FILE STRUCTURES of Linux Mint Mate so that those settings can be properly preserved for use by subsequent sessions of firefox/gmail.

Please consider fixing this.

Thanks.

title: Amtrak Customer Service Number: Email/Phone/Chat Optional
content:
To reach a live person at Amtrak customer service for support, you can call their 24/7 Amtrak Phone number hotline at 1-844-429-1424. OTA (Live Person) or 1-800-Amtrak 1-844-429-1424. You can also use the live chat feature on their website or reach out to them via email. Speaking with a live representative at Amtrak is straightforward . Whether you're dealing with booking issues, need to make changes to your travel plans, or have specific inquiries, reaching out to a live agent can quickly resolve your concerns. This guide explains the steps to contact Amtrak customer service via phone and provides tips on the best times to call to minimize wait times.


Why Contact a Live Person at Amtrak?


There are many reasons why speaking to a live person might be the best route to resolving your issue. Common scenarios include:




Flight changes or cancellations: If your plans have changed, you need live assistance at Amtrak (1-844-429-1424) with adjusting or canceling your flights, or you’re dealing with flight cancellations and delays.


Booking clarification: Sometimes you need more details or help to understand the specifics of your Amtrak booking (1-844-429-1424) and reservation.


Refunds and compensation: Automated systems often cannot handle complex refund requests or compensation claims, making & Amtrak live agent (1-844-429-1424) invaluable.


Technical glitches: If there’s a technical issue with your booking, like payment errors, Amtrak live customer service (1-844-429-1424) can resolve it quickly.


Amtrak’s Contact Options


Amtrak offers several ways to get in touch with their customer service, whether you prefer calling, chatting, or reaching out on social media.



1. Calling Amtrak’s Customer Service Hotline


The most straightforward way to talk to a live person is by calling their customer service hotline. Amtrak’s main customer service number is 1-800-Amtrak (1-844-429-1424) or (1-844-429-1424) OTA (Live Person). When you call, you’ll be prompted to select options that direct you to the appropriate department, but be patient—there is always a way to reach a live person.


2. Using Amtrak’s Live Chat Feature


If waiting on hold isn’t your style, you can use Amtrak’s live chat feature. Simply head over to their website, navigate to the Help section, and select the chat option. This connects you with a real person who can assist you just as well as phone support can.


3. Reaching Out on Social Media


Amtrak is active on social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook. Many customers have found that sending a message via these platforms leads to quick responses, especially for general inquiries.


4. Utilizing the Amtrak Mobile App for Support


The Amtrak app Amtrak desde un cellular (1-844-429-1424) is another handy way to contact support. It provides options to call or chat with customer service directly from the app, giving you another method to reach a live person without needing to switch devices.




5. Emailing Amtrak’s Support


For less urgent issues, emailing Amtrak is another option. While response times can be longer, this method ensures that you have written documentation of your issue and any communication regarding its resolution.


Step-by-Step: Talking to a Live Person via Phone


Listen to the automated prompts and select the option that best matches your issue. Typically, you’ll want to choose options like “existing reservations” or “technical support.”If prompted to enter your itinerary number but you don’t have it, pressing “0” can sometimes bypass this step. Repeat “agent” or “representative” when asked what you need. This often speeds up the process.




Important Numbers for International Callers


If you’re calling from outside the U.S., here are some useful numbers:


Amtrak UK:


Amtrak phone number en español :


Amtrak Canada: 1-844-429-1424


Amtrak Australia:


Common Customer Service Queries


1. Changes to Flights and Cancellations.


Flight issues are one of the most common reasons people contact Amtrak. Whether you need to change your flight or cancel it altogether, customer service agents (1-844-429-1424) OTA can guide you through the process.


2. Hotel Booking Issues


Issues with hotel bookings, such as wrong dates, missing reservations, or refund requests, can all be handled by Amtrak’s customer service (1-844-429-1424) OTA team.


3. Refunds and Compensation


If you’re entitled to a refund or compensation, contacting a live person (1-844-429-1424) OTA ensures that your case is handled properly. This can include flight refunds, hotel refunds, or compensation for disruptions.

Hallo, ik wil een video van een NVR speler in mijn netwerk via Firefox afspelen maar dat lukt niet. Ik ben alle instellingen al nagelopen maar niets werkt. Ik log in via mijn netwerk 192.168. etc ik zie dan alles, menustructuur etc maar bij het afspelen gebeurd er niets. Heb een aanvullende plugin geïnstalleerd maar ook dat werkt niet.

Wanneer ik met Edge hetzelfde doe kan ik de beelden wel zien, maar ik gebruik liever Firefox, wat kan ik doen om het te laten werken?

title: I use max length Tabs, and the tabs scroll is in 10 tabs, how do i change this?
content:
So I change the tabs maxim length (i chose 225) because i hate not seeing the name of the tabs that i have open, now i have 10 tabs on my sight on my monitor, i usually open a LOT of tabs for youtube videos or so on, and have a constant of 40+ tabs open

the issue is when i scroll through the tabs with my mouse wheel, it jumps 10 tabs at once, now i see the arrows on the side of the tabs, my monitor is Ultra Wide so is annoying to keep pressing that Scroll backwards & Forwards button especially when the speed is to slow, while my mouse wheel speed is in 10 tabs TO fast!

Is there a way to change the Speed of the mouse wheel scroll tabs ? something in about:config ? or a Add-on?

title: Why won't it let me check the box to "open previous windows and tabs" on start in settings?
content: After downloaded the app I changed a lot of settings, including checking the box to "open previous windows and tabs" on start in settings, however next time I opened the browser it didn't open my previous tabs and when I went to check the setting the box was unchecked and it won't allow me to check it. Why did this happen and how can I fix it? Note: IIRC, I changed all my settings and then created a Mozilla account and that is the only possible connection to this issue that I can think of.
creator: loosh

title: File Upload Fails in Firefox 135 Using Multipart Form Data with jQuery Ajax
content:
Description: After upgrading to Firefox 135, we are experiencing an issue where file uploads using the multipart/form-data format fail to complete successfully. The issue occurs when submitting a form using the jQuery Ajax method ($.ajax) with enctype="multipart/form-data".

Key Observations: • The same implementation works fine in Firefox 133 and other browsers (Chrome, Edge, etc.). • Our SSL certificate is rated B on SSL Labs, with TLS 1.3 enabled. • The issue persists even after disabling browser extensions and clearing browser cookies/cache.

Environment Details: • Browser: Firefox 135 • Form Submission Method: $.ajax({ type: "POST", enctype: "multipart/form-data", ... })

API Response - 520: Web server is returning an unknown error

We suspect this might be related to a security policy change in Firefox 135 affecting file uploads. If anyone has encountered a similar issue or has insights into recent changes in how Firefox handles multipart/form-data, please share any possible solutions. Would appreciate any guidance or workarounds!
creator: wwmmisa

title: How do I reset my account data?
content: If I go on any website using OSM data (including OpenStreetMap itself) on Firefox logged into my account, I experience a lot of slowdown. This doesn't happen when I use incognito mode or when I use another browser, so I'm pretty sure there's some kind of cache or something that's connected to my Mozilla account that slows down OSM massively. I've tried clearing all cache and all cookies. I've even refreshed Firefox using the installer and it's still slow. I don't want to bother with deleting my account and creating a new one. What should I do to try and return back to normalcy on OSM?

title: Printing PDF
content:
When printing a PDF with custom page ranges, the footer text in the print preview (see image) does not match the actual page. As shown in the example image, if I want to print pages 2-16, the preview indicating page 4 is actually page 5.

So, if I want to print with a very custom range, such as 2-4, 6-10, 12-14, 16, it will be very confusing and will take longer to adjust.

And I also print custom ranges like this very often for daily tasks. I’m not sure if this is a bug or just a minor adjustment needed in Firefox’s coding. Thank you in advance for your help.

title: Confusion in "send Tab to device" when Firefox Desktop synced with two iPhone15.
content: Hi, My Firefox desktop is synced using Mozilla account with two iPhone-15 Firefox for iOS browsers perfectly. Individually I have no problems sending to and fro the tabs from desktop to iPhone and vice versa. When there are two iPhones involved (say work and personal iPhones), trouble arises. Problem#1: why does Firefox continue to refer to my iPhone-15 whose name is "ABC iPhone15" as merely "iPhone"? Thereby when I send my tabs to my device it will be "Firefox on iPhone". It should be "Firefox on ABC iPhone15" Problem#2: Confusion furthers when there are two iPhone-15 synced with the FF Desktop. Both continue to be referred to as "Firefox on iPhone". How would I know which one is the personal versus work iPhone?
